pr_title: Fix remove actions for entry types in the editor

timeline.message:
Fix remove actions for entry types in the editor
fixes #6906
* Created separate view models for standard and custom entry types, adding remove icon only for the custom ones
* Updated CHANGELOG.md

timeline.bodyText: Is this class really necessary? Wouldn't it be enough to make EntryTypeViewModel not abstract and to extend it to the CustomEntryTypeViewModel?
timeline.author: calixtus

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I also though of that. I can change it.
replies.author: dawidm
